#labels Phase-Deploy
= Device Supported =

 * PopcornHour A100 series
 * PopcornHour A200 series
 * PopcornHour C200 series

== Easy setup ==

Please refer to this topic on nmt forums. 
http://www.networkedmediatank.com/showthread.php?tid=56777

== Manual setup ==

You must enable SSH access to your NMT and chmod +x the script to allow it to run.

Also make sure that the user that runs Transmission has write permission on your destination_folder.
